actions.name: AcceptAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to accept an AWS agreement that has not yet been accepted by the customer account.

actions.name: DownloadAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to download an AWS agreement that has not yet been accepted or a customer agreement that has been accepted by the customer account.

actions.name: Get
actions.description: Grants permission to download an AWS compliance report package.

actions.name: TerminateAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to terminate a customer agreement that was previously accepted by the customer account.
